messages.subject: Peabody MA Conference  was: Re: [unschoolingbasics] being part of a family/community
messages.msgSnippet: Hello! I m contemplating coming to the conference, and wanted to know if, in previous year, others have come alone with a toddler? My dd will be 29 months
messages.messageBody:
Hello!

I'm contemplating coming to the conference, and wanted to know if, in previous year, others have come alone with a toddler? My dd will be 29 months then...Dh may or may not be able to attend, too...

Tracy A

----- Original Message -----
From: Ren Allen
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, July 11, 2004 3:27 PM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] being part of a family/community


"We also couldn't leave
the animals with no care, nor taking the time away from our kids."

That's the beauty of an unschooling conference...it's for the whole
family. Do you not have neighbors that will watch the animals for a
weekend?
Time away from the kids is NOT an issue at Live and Learn!:)

Ren
